properties.headline: Flood Warning issued February 12 at 7:25PM CST by NWS Paducah KY
properties.description:
...The flood warning continues for the following rivers in
Kentucky...

Green River at Calhoun and Paradise

.Runoff from recent heavy rainfall will cause the Green River at Paradise
and at Calhoun to rise into moderate flood stage. At Paradise, the river
is forecast to crest at 387.8 feet on Friday morning. At Calhoun, the
river is forecast to crest at 28.3 on Monday morning.

The Flood Warning continues for
the Green River at Paradise
* until further notice.
* At  6:15 PM Wednesday the stage was 385.3 feet.
* Flood Stage is 380.0 feet.
* Minor flooding is occurring and Moderate flooding is forecast.
* Forecast...The river will continue rising to near 387.8 feet by
Friday morning then begin a slow fall.
properties.instruction:
SAFETY MESSAGE...

Never drive cars...trucks or sport utility vehicles through flooded
areas. The water may be too deep to allow safe passage. Never allow
children to play in or near flood waters. Stay tuned to NOAA Weather
Radio or your local media for further statements and possible updated
forecasts.

Additional information is available at
http://www.crh.noaa.gov/ahps2/index.php?wfo=pah /lower case/
